title: Update Home hero section welcome message and styling

requirements.summary: Replace HeroSection heading/description with the provided team-member welcome message and adjust typography/colors for high-contrast, modern agency look on the existing dark hero background.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection.tsx` no longer displays the old heading (“Welcome to My Blog”) or the old description paragraph.

The hero section displays the exact message text (verbatim, including punctuation and the "10-15 minutes" range): "Assalamu Alaikum, I am Md. Habibur Rahman. I am working on professional typing projects in international marketplaces and building a skilled working team here. You can join my team, learn simple typing tasks in 10-15 minutes, and start earning with us."

The hero message text is rendered in a clean, modern font style and appears in white or light-yellow (or a white-to-light-yellow treatment) with sufficient contrast against the existing dark/overlay hero background.
The updated hero section looks consistent with the site’s existing professional/neon theme and remains responsive on mobile and desktop without overlapping or truncation.

file_operations.description: Update the hero heading and paragraph to the exact provided welcome message (verbatim, including "10-15 minutes"), removing the old "Welcome to My Blog" text and prior description. Adjust Tailwind classes within this component to use a clean modern font treatment (e.g., font-sans, balanced weights/leading) and set text color to white and/or light-yellow with sufficient contrast against the current dark/overlay background, while keeping the existing hero layout and CTA links unchanged and responsive.
